physical_appearance: "The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features an image of a road. Carts pulled by oxen can seen going in opposite directions on the road. To the right hand side of the photograph, there are a three peopl walking on the edge of the road. ""Singapore"" is displayed at the top. ""Char à Buffles & Malaises’"" is displayed at the bottom. "
sgcool_label_text: This photograph shows carts being pulled by oxen along a road. It is inscribed with ‘Singapore. Char à Buffles & Malaises’.
title_text: Photograph of a road with carts pulled by oxen
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Carriages and carts Oxen Roads
